name: A Raving Lunatic
description:
This is a simple role-playing game
The background of the story is set in a future hospital
A certain mental hospital

Our protagonist is a patient from this hospital
At the same time, he is also the leader of patients in this hospital!
The doctors in the hospital are increasing their treatment efforts, causing them unbearable suffering
So these patients chose to resist
-
You will be leading these patients in the hospital
Take them to battle
Take them to freedom

In the game, you need to constantly expand your team
Obtain stronger weapons
--
--
